revision.text: The [http://www.gimp.org/ Gnu Image Manipulation Program] is a powerful and popular pixel pushing program, and a free software competitor to Adobe Photoshop. Its main interest for ZDoom modders is probably to edit [[PNG]] files. ==Palette files== To save a PNG with the [[Doom]] [[palette]] for latter conversion to Doom graphic files, you can save [[:File:Doom.gpl|this file]] in your GIMP/share/gimp/2.0/palettes folder (the GIMP folder will typically be %APPDATA%\GIMP\2.10\ on Windows systems and ~/.gimp/ on Linux systems). [[:File:Heretic.gpl|This file]] contains a similar palette for [[Heretic]], and [[:File:Hexen.gpl|this one]] contains one for [[Hexen]]. [[Category:Tools]]
